title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear in the first Combo "Host:".
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not result in the focus caret appearing.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo "Host:" when it is clicked.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software.
2. Locate the first Combo labeled "Host:".
3. Click on the first Combo.
4. Verify if the focus caret appears in the first Combo.
